ext_weather.name: This Afternoon
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy, with a high near 57. Southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
